name: Machining Register
query:
Select 
m.date AS 'Posting Date',
m.name AS 'Machining ID',
m.total_ok_qty AS 'Total Ok Quantity',
m.total_cr_qty AS 'Total CR Quantity',
m.total_mr_qty AS 'Total MR Quantity',
m.total_rw_qty AS 'Total RW Quantity',
m.total_ok_weight AS 'OK Weight',
m.total_cr_weight AS 'CR Weight',
m.total_mr_weight AS 'MR Weight',
m.total_rw_weight AS 'RR Weight',
m.total_additional_cost AS 'Additional Cost',
m.shift_time AS 'Shift Time',
m.company AS 'Company',
m.operator AS 'Operator',
m.operator_name AS 'Operator Name',
m.supervisor AS 'Supervisor',
m.supervisor_name AS 'Supervisor Name'

FROM `tabMachining` m 


Where m.date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s 
AND m.company = %(company)s AND m.docstatus = 1 AND m.operator = %(operator)s AND m.supervisor = %(supervisor)s
